org.transitime.ipc.data

Class Prediction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.ipc.data.Prediction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Prediction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains information on a single prediction. For providing info to client.

    Declared serializable since using RMI to pass back Prediction objects and RMI uses serialization.

    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:

      • getPassengerCount

        public short getPassengerCount()
        Returns the passenger count as obtained from the AVL feed. The value will not be valid for systems that do not have passenger counting sensors. Therefore should use isPassengerCountValid() to determine if the value is valid.
        Returns:
        Passenger count from the AVL feed

      • isPassengerCountValid

        public boolean isPassengerCountValid()
        Passenger counts only valid for systems where there actually are passenger counting sensors.
        Returns:
        True if getPassengerCount() returns a valid value

      • isArrival

        public boolean isArrival()
